Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
org.unbunt.ella Provides an implementation of the EllaScript programming language.
org.unbunt.ella.compiler Provides infrastructure for compiling programs written in the EllaScript language.
org.unbunt.ella.compiler.antlr Provides utility classes to be used as replacements for their corresponding classes in the standard ANTLR runtime library.
org.unbunt.ella.compiler.statement Provides classes representing elements of EllaScript programs.
org.unbunt.ella.compiler.stmtbase Provides core interfaces to be implemented by classes representing EllaScript statements or expressions.
org.unbunt.ella.compiler.support Provides various utility classes to be used during the compilation of EllaScript programs.
org.unbunt.ella.engine Provides an implementation of an execution engine for compiled EllaScript programs.
org.unbunt.ella.engine.context Provides interfaces to be implemented by classes representing execution contexts of programs executed by the engine.
org.unbunt.ella.engine.continuations Provides interfaces and classes representing continuations in the evaluation of expressions and statements.
org.unbunt.ella.engine.corelang Provides core objects of the EllaScript language in the form of interfaces and classes.
org.unbunt.ella.engine.environment Provides interfaces and classes modeling environments.
org.unbunt.ella.exception Collection of various exception classes and supporting utilities.
org.unbunt.ella.lang Contains the runtime library for use in EllaScript programs.
org.unbunt.ella.lang.sql Contains the database specific part of the runtime library.
org.unbunt.ella.resource Provides an infrastructure for working with various types of resources in a generic way.
org.unbunt.ella.utils Provides generic support classes.
